backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining Nakshatra ranges and functions to determine a nakshatra and pada from lunar longitude.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping features to impacted frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files for planning and documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/alerts/AlertsTog: Toggle switch component enabling or disabling nakshatra change alerts.
frontend/src/components/alerts/Nakshatra: Banner alert shown when the nakshatra changes, with dismiss control.
Dialog for selecting a city or using geolocation, with search, validation, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header showing navigation, current city with local time, city picker button, and alerts toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main application layout with header, routed content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Naksha: Renders a clickable card linking to a Nakshatra detail page, showing name, number, symbols, and ruler.
Displays detailed Nakshatra information including symbols, deity, traits, and pada breakdown using cards and accordions.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Transi: Calculates and shows estimated times for the next pada and nakshatra transitions based on moon movement.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyInter: Shows daily interpretation content for a given Nakshatra, including emotional climate and a narrative description.
frontend/src/data/cities.ts: Provides a list of cities with names, timezones, coordinates, and optional geolocation flag.
Contains predefined daily interpretive text for each Nakshatra.
frontend/src/data/nakshatras.ts: Defines Nakshatra data including symbols, deity, traits, and detailed pada information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCitySelection.ts: Manages the selected city with validation, localStorage syncing, and live local time updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Custom hook for synced localStorage state with cross-tab and same‑tab subscriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraAlerts.ts: Tracks nakshatra changes and shows an alert banner when the current nakshatra differs from the last seen.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraNow.ts: Polls lunar longitude based on city timezone and queries the current nakshatra.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines the nakshatra lookup query using an actor and react‑query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/astro/lunarLongitude.ts: Computes an approximate lunar longitude for a given date using a simplified formula.
frontend/src/lib/nakshatra/index.ts: Utilities for slug generation and lookup of nakshatras by slug.
frontend/src/lib/time/timezone.ts: Formats timezone transitions and constructs Date objects representing local time in a target timezone.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point wiring React, react‑query, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBasePage.tsx: Searchable list page displaying all nakshatras with filtering UI.
frontend/src/pages/NakshatraDetailPage.t: Detail page showing full information for a selected nakshatra using its slug.
frontend/src/pages/TodayPage.tsx: React page that displays the current Nakshatra and Pada for the selected city, including hero section, data card, transition times, and daily interpretation blocks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, container settings, and theming utilities for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the app’s purpose, architecture notes, known bugs, and implemented feature list for Daily Nakshatra.
